node.html:
• Spearheaded a project to introduce a modern approach of analyzing social interaction data using DeepLabCut
  • Developed an automated process for analyzing convoluted touchscreen data with the usage of Python, Pandas, and Tkinter
  • Investigate the effects of ketamine on pattern separation and cognition in CSDS-affected mice by conducting 6 months of touchscreen experiments, 10 days of CSDS tests, and 4 days of SI tests

• Assisted students with technological problems including account, software, and hardware issues.
  • Provided one-on-one sessions on configuring computers and retailing technological resources for over 150 students.

• Learned foundational basis of filmmaking, camera operation, and video editing using industry standard tools such as Final Cut Pro X.
  • Wrote, directed, and edited a personal short film project exploring depression and school burnout.
